import '../styles/Cart.css' import { useState } from 'react' function Cart() { const [cart, setCart] = useState(initialState) const monsteraPrice = 8 const ivyPrice = 10 const flowerPrice = 15 return (

Panier

  • Monstera : {monsteraPrice}€
  • Lierre : {ivyPrice}€
  • Fleurs : {flowerPrice}€
Total : {monsteraPrice + ivyPrice + flowerPrice }€
) } export default Cart
